channel.title: Attend on AutoML 2023
channel.description: Recent content in Attend on AutoML 2023

item.title: Poster session instructions
item.description: The poster session will use video screens (not physical posters), so that online and in-person participants can both participate in the same poster session.

item.title: Online Experience
item.description: As announced in our blog post, we are thrilled to have a hybrid conference.

item.title: Pricing
item.description: REGULAR RATE Non-student: 500 € Student: 300 € Virtual-only non-student: 100 € Virtual-only student: 50 € (first 100 registered: free)

item.title: Visa Letter
item.description: Please note that letters of invitation to AutoML Conference 2023 are only available for registered participants.

item.title: Travel Awards
item.description: To support researchers in need of financial assistance (for whatever reason), we have a small number of limited travel awards available.

item.title: Volunteer Discount
item.description: Students can obtain a free registration by applying to volunteer in person for 2 hours at AutoML'23.

item.title: Code of Conduct
item.description: The open exchange of ideas, the freedom of thought and expression, and respectful scientific debate are central to the goals of this conference on automated machine learning; this requires a community and an environment that recognizes and respects the inherent worth of every person.

item.title: Hotels
item.description: B&B Hotel Berlin-Tiergarten S-Bahn Station Tiergarten (~26min by train) Hotel Art Nouveau S-Bahn Station Charlottenburg - (~20min by train)
